§ 100501. Areas included in System The System shall include any area of land and water administered by the Secretary, acting through the Director, for park, monument, historic, parkway, recreational, or other purposes. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3098.)
